content.text: Hi, I'm participant_2. What do you do for a living?
I'm a zookeeper. I work with my wife, who is a breast cancer survivor. We have a daughter who just graduated high school ranked at the top of her class.
That's great! I work too much. I take forever to get tasks done, so I start early and clock out late. I think I need a vacation.
I know what you mean. I can be a bit of a perfectionist, so I'll redo things again and again until they're perfect. It can be a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
It sounds like you have a lot going on in your life. What's your favorite thing about your job?
My favorite thing about my job is working with animals. I love learning about their behavior and helping them to thrive.
That's awesome. I've always wanted to work with animals, but I'm not sure I'm cut out for it.
I think you'd be great at it! You seem like you're very patient and caring.
Thanks! I've been thinking about getting a dog, but I'm not sure if I'm ready for that kind of commitment.
A dog is a big responsibility, but it can also be a great companion. If you're ready for the challenge, I say go for it!
Thanks for the advice! I'll think about it.
